description: This Kotlin source file defines the MainActivity class for an expense tracker Android application. It serves as the main entry point for the app's UI, initializing layout, wiring UI interactions, and observing ViewModel state flows to update the UI with dynamic data such as navigation labels, financial summaries, and transaction counts.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Android activity that manages the main UI of the expense tracker, including navigation buttons, labels, and financial summaries.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when activity is created; sets up UI and observers.

methods.name: setupClicks
methods.description: Configures click listeners for navigation buttons to change the displayed month.

methods.name: setupObservers
methods.description: Launches coroutines to observe ViewModel StateFlows and update UI elements accordingly.
